org.mule.modules.openidconnect.client.tokenvalidation

Class TokenValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mule.modules.openidconnect.client.tokenvalidation.TokenValidator

  • public class TokenValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the functionality to validate tokens. Local with the TokenVerifier or with sending a http request to the identity provider for token introspection
    Author:
    Moritz MÃ¶ller, AOE GmbH

    • Method Detail

      • introspectionTokenValidation

        public net.minidev.json.JSONObject introspectionTokenValidation(java.lang.String authHeader,
                                                                SingleSignOnConfig ssoConfig)
                                                         throws TokenValidationException,
                                                                HTTPConnectException
        Validates a token from authHeader by sending an http request to the introspection endpoint of an identity provider
        Parameters:
        authHeader - Authorization header string from HTTP Request
        ssoConfig - Config object with all necessary identity provider information
        Returns:
        JSONObject including the token claims
        Throws:
        TokenValidationException - if introspection fails
        HTTPConnectException - if connecting to the identity provider fails

      • localTokenValidation

        public com.nimbusds.jwt.JWTClaimsSet localTokenValidation(java.lang.String authHeader,
                                                          SingleSignOnConfig ssoConfig)
                                                   throws TokenValidationException
        Calls the TokenVerifier to verify the given token
        Parameters:
        authHeader - Authorization header string from HTTP Request
        ssoConfig - Config object with all necessary identity provider information
        Returns:
        The JWTClaimsSet of the given token
        Throws:
        TokenValidationException - if token validation fails

      • createTokenIntrospectionRequest

        public com.nimbusds.oauth2.sdk.TokenIntrospectionRequest createTokenIntrospectionRequest(com.nimbusds.oauth2.sdk.token.AccessToken accessToken,
                                                                                         SingleSignOnConfig ssoConfig)
        Builds and returns a valid token introspection request defined by RFC7662
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Token which has to be introspected
        ssoConfig - Config object with all necessary identity provider information
        Returns:
        The introspection request
        See Also:
        RFC7662

        public void setParser(NimbusParserUtil parser)
